properties.name: Body cremated by mob.
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz  In July of 1903 a mob overtook city hall to kidnap John Metcalf, a black man who allegedly shot and killed a white man ealier in the evening outside of the bar. After beating, dragging, and hanging him, this is where he was eventually brought and set on fire. The site has changed drastically since then, but at the time it was accross the street from the Vermilion County Jail.

properties.name: Body hanged by mob.
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz  In July of 1903 a mob overtook city hall to kidnap John Metcalf, a black man who allegedly shot and killed a white man ealier in the evening outside of the bar. After beating and dragging him, he was hanged in this location. Eventually he would be taken across the street from the County Jail and his body would be burned.

properties.name: City Hall 1903
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz  In July of 1903 a mob overtook city hall. Their collective action caused the sheriff and other officers to flee, defenseless against over a thousand rioters. There was no one was left to protect the prisoner the mob would eventually kidnap. The mob was angered by a shooting earlier in the evening. John Metcalf allegedly shot and killed Carl Gatterman, a white man, outside of a saloon. Now the site is occupied with a dilapidated parking garage.

properties.name: Former Shell Station.
properties.description: Posted by HschultzAt one time a Shell gas station just off of Interstate 74, directly across the interstate from the site of the GM plant. Like GM, the Shell station is closed and dilapidated.

properties.name: Former location of General Motors.
properties.description: Posted by HschultzIn 1995 General Motors, an important contributor of the Danville area economy was closed, and a few years ago most of the factory was torn down.

properties.name: Old Illinois Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz  The Illinois Theatre was purchased by the local KKK during their political prime in the 20s. The Urbana chapter had become so large that a venue the size of the Illinois theatre was necessary to hold their meetings.

properties.name: Powertrain (GM) Baseball park.
properties.description: Posted by HschultzI played little league baseball here when I was a kid. I never thought about the strangeness of the park still having GM signs all over even though it was closed and was a major blow to the area. The park is still alive and well though.

properties.name: Pulling teeth.
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz One of two building just torn down in my hometown. This one is really strange to me. I showed these photos to a few people and one told me it was like they had pulled a tooth and now there is just a weird gap...That seems really appropriate.

properties.name: Shangri-la
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz  This is where Shangri-la road starts/ends. It\'s an amazing and beautiful drive, unfortunately these photographs don\'t to it much justice. Earlier this year I created a video that examines how the road got its name by mixing personal experience and memory with history and cultural knowledge.

properties.name: Vermilion County Jail
properties.description: Posted by HschultzAfter John Metcalf was burned across the street the mob once again attempted to overtake the law and decided to try to kidnap another prisoner. Jim Wilson, a black man who allegedly assaulted a white woman in Alvin, Illinois (approx. 15 mi. north of Danville), was the target this time. Little did the mob know Sheriff Hardy Whitlock would fire into the crowd of a couple thousand with his shotgun to disperse the furious crowd. Whitlock would later be both loved by some and hated by others for his management of the riot. Many could not believe Whitlock would shoot white men to defend a black criminal, while others, including President Roosevelt, believed what Whitlock had done to terminate the riot was extremely commendable.

properties.name: odd lot #1
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz This is a lot that is a result of being overtaken by a construction site and parking lot. Previous to this there was a large field frequently used for ultimate frisbee, soccer and band practice for the Marching Illini. I\'ll be working with this space for class on site specificity so check in for more posts.

properties.name: old vacant bar
properties.description: Posted by HschultzThere are hundreds of little relics inside the space, it\'s very exciting.

properties.name: removal.
properties.description: Posted by HschultzIn my hometown of Westville this is one of two buildings that they just tore down. The building was host to several failed businesses and a locally famous restaurant called "Trio\'s".

properties.name: site of cross burning, 1923
properties.description: Posted by Hschultz  In 1923 an approximately 40 ft. cross was set on fire by the local chapter of the Ku Klux Klan.
